title: Episode 30: Christian on Evangelical Masculinity
description:
Today I have a conversation with my friend Christian about the ideas of the masculine and feminine in the evangelical church . We covered a lot of topics but we spend a good amount of time talking about Mars Hill podcast from Christianity today and the way that it tried to appeal to young men. I hope you enjoy the conversation!

Mars Hill Podcast: https://podcasts.apple.com/us/podcast/the-rise-and-fall-of-mars-hill/id1569401963
Christians conversation with Paul: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=7WwdHAFRB14
